params.description: Parameters in the first level of analysis or sensor level

method.description: Default <<hilbert>>. <<hilbert>> Window for hilbert envelope. <<thomson>> Windows for Thomson spectral estimate.

layout.description: for CHBM data <<EEG1020.lay>> and for CMI data <<GSN-HydroCel-129.sfp>> for MEG <<4D248_helmet.mat>>

frequencies.name: delta
frequencies.description: delta band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

frequencies.name: theta
frequencies.description: theta band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

frequencies.name: alpha
frequencies.description: alpha band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

frequencies.name: beta
frequencies.description: beta band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

frequencies.name: gamma1
frequencies.description: slow gamma band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

frequencies.name: gamma2
frequencies.description: fast gamma band. the starting and ending frequencies of the band are <<f_start>> and <<f_end>>. set run in <<true>> if you want this band to be analyzed

max_freq.description: Maximum frequency under analysis. equal or higher than the ending of the faster band considered

freq_gfiltvar.description: default <<2>>. Variance (given in Hz) for the gaussian response filter of the data

win_order.description: default <<3>>. Windowing Order. number of Slepian sequences in this case
